validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

Slides.title: Doroosi Platform
Slides.subtitle: An educational platform offering individual lessons for students, online (remote) and offline (at home), with many other features and possibilities.

Slides.title: Flexible and Varied Plans
Slides.subtitle: You can choose your lesson plan price according to your needs, within packages defined by duration and number of lessons.

Slides.title: Reschedule Lessons
Slides.subtitle: No more being constrained by lesson times, as you can reschedule lessons up to 24 hours before the scheduled time.

Slides.title: Higher Focus Without Distraction
Slides.subtitle: No need to distract your attention during the lesson by taking notes, as you can record the lesson for later review and benefit.
